name: Rain of Arrows
description:
Fight for your life in this archery shooter! You will need all of your speed and skills as you block arrows, dodge fireballs, and battle your way through a horde of enemies and bosses. The numbers are against you, but you can turn the tide with a variety of magical powers.



Impress the gods with your skills and use their favor to purchase upgrades and grow even stronger. Fight to the death, and just maybe, you will be the last one standing in the end!
